      • convertToRiskMap

        RiskMap convertToRiskMap(java.util.List<ContinentDto> continentList,
                         java.util.List<CountryDto> countryList,
                         java.util.List<NeighbourTerritoriesDto> neighbourList)
        This method will convert data added by user to map and make .map file
        Parameters:
        continentList - is list of continentDto added by user
        countryList - is list of country DTO
        neighbourList - is list of NeighbourTerritoriesDto
        Returns:

      • convertRiskMapToDtos

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> convertRiskMapToDtos(RiskMap riskMap)
        This is a reverse from above method. It will read data from .map file and convert it to DTo and send it to view side.
        Parameters:
        riskMap - is model sent by service side
        Returns:
        map of DTO

      • saveMapToFile

        boolean saveMapToFile(RiskMap riskMap)
               throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                      java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException
        This method will make returns true if riskmap file successfully created from data given from user side.
        Parameters:
        riskMap - is model sent by service side
        Returns:
        true if file got saved successfully
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
